name: Zombies Sim 3D
description:
Zombies Sim 3D!!!
A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a dead zone full of zombies. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies.
Features
Action game.
Enjoy the realistic sound effect and music
Kills counter - Bring smash death to zombies which are chasing you.
Realistic physics.
